author: GameSpot
description:
From new mechanics and other worlds to the largest roster of playable characters in the franchise’s history, here’s everything to know about Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds.

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
00:19 - Development
01:24 - Characters
02:32 - Gameplay
04:44 - Release Date & Price

For a full list of characters: https://www.gamespot.com/gallery/all-characters-in-sonic-racing-crossworlds/2900-6920/

#gaming #gamespot 

Credits: Tom Caswell
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Everything To Know

author: GameSpot
description: Tune in on September 18th starting at 8:50AM PT for the Six One Indie Showcase Pre-Show. At 9:00 PT the main show will start and features never-before-seen world premieres, digital showcase debuts, and exclusive news from 47 indie developers and publishers. Expect the first look at the brand-new game from ORIGAME DIGITAL, the gameplay reveal for Lil Gator Game: In the Dark, and much more.
title: Six One Indie Showcase Livestream (September 18th, 2025)

author: GameSpot
description: The sixth annual GDoCExpo Direct is packed with new announcements from dozens of amazing games by creators of color. Tune in for exclusive reveals, the latest launches, and more updates.
title: Game Devs of Color Expo Direct 2025 Livestream (Indie Games Showcase)
